textSub.name: para1
textSub.string:
You're nearing the lair of the ocean's shark king, but
 your path is barred by a maze of land mines. Scoop up
 40 bonus bubbles in order to get through.

textSub.name: para2
textSub.string:
HINT:
 Don't waste your time trying to eat the minnows.
 Let them clear a path through the mines for you. Try
 to stock up on extra lives for your final showdown!
